r.s: Allows setting the current process name on Linux and BSD
r.d: This extension allows changing the current process' name on Linux and *BSD systems. This is useful when using pcntl_fork() to identify running processes in process list
r.n: - Fixed package version by using a define (suggested by rza) - Added setthreadtitle() (bjori) - Fixed compatibility for PHP 5.4+ (johannes)
